timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: Or maybe you forgot to pass the variable in Controller.java in lines 171 & 173?
replies.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: I exposed this so that I could mock this variable for testing. Do you want me to revert to old behavior?
replies.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: Ok, then maybe provide an extra constructor with the default value instead so we can simplify initialization in Controller method.
replies.author: manusa

timeline.bodyText: Given the fact that resync period is expected to be positive, maybe we should add a check+IllegalArgumentException here so that users won't remain clueless in case for some reason this class was instantiated directly (not through Controller.java)
timeline.author: manusa

replies.bodyText: ohk, right now we were using a Default resync period of 5 seconds upon invalid resync period. But throwing IllegalArgumentException sounds better to me. Let me update
replies.author: rohanKanojia

timeline.message:
Fix #2651: SharedInformers should ignore resync on zero resyncPeriod

Refactor Reflector to ignore resync if resyncPeriod is set to zero
Throw IllegalArgumentException on negative resync period instead
